assessment_item.title: கக்குவான் இருமலின் நோய்க் காரணி ________.7UQZX7Q20
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

கக்குவான் இருமலின் நோய்க் காரணி ________.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

பிளாஸ்டோமைசிஸ் டெர்மாடெட்டிஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4129"},{"text":"

போர்டெட்ல்லா பெர்டியூசிஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4130"},{"text":"

ஹீமோபிலஸ் இன்புளுயன்சே

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4140"},{"text":"

ரைனோ வைரஸ்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4145"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"கக்குவான் இருமலின் நோய்க் காரணி ________.7UQZX7Q20","title":"கக்குவான் இருமலின் நோய்க் காரணி ________.7UQZX7Q20","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
